content: dubious to invoke self-evidence re: concept of Being
linkedContent: dubious to invoke self-evidence re: concept of Being

content: the Being of entities ‘is’ not itself an entity > [“is” method] everything we talk about, everything we have in view, everything to which we comport ourselves in any way, is being > what/how we are is being
linkedContent: the Being of entities ‘is’ not itself an entity > [“is” method] everything we talk about, everything we have in view, everything to which we comport ourselves in any way, is being > what/how we are is being

content: Heidegger asks whether there’s a manifest circularity in method that will ask about Being by asking Dasein, the entity each of us is himself > no, he replies, factically there is no circle, one can determine nature of entities in their Being w/out explicit concept of meaning of Being at one’s disposal
linkedContent: Heidegger asks whether there’s a manifest circularity in method that will ask about Being by asking Dasein, the entity each of us is himself > no, he replies, factically there is no circle, one can determine nature of entities in their Being w/out explicit concept of meaning of Being at one’s disposal

content: Dasein always understands itself in terms of its existence [uniquely]
linkedContent: Dasein always understands itself in terms of its existence [uniquely]

content: question of Being, fundamental ontology, must be sought in existential analytic of Dasein
linkedContent: question of Being, fundamental ontology, must be sought in existential analytic of Dasein

content: Dasein in relation to its past: ‘historizes’ out of its future on each occasion
linkedContent: Dasein in relation to its past: ‘historizes’ out of its future on each occasion

content: Dasein can discover tradition, preserve it, study it, w/ proper attention given to elemental historicality of Dasein
linkedContent: Dasein can discover tradition, preserve it, study it, w/ proper attention given to elemental historicality of Dasein

content: existentiality as inquiry into meaning of Being > question of meaning of Being understands itself as historiological [?]
linkedContent: existentiality as inquiry into meaning of Being > question of meaning of Being understands itself as historiological [?]

content: Dasein falls prey to tradition, which keeps it from providing its own guidance > tradition takes what has come down to us, delivers it to self-evidence, blocks access to primordial ‘sources’ of categories/concepts

content: [destruction not deconstruction] taking question of Being as our clue, we are to destroy traditional content of ancient ontology, until we arrive at primordial experiences [utterly impossible for Derrida] that achieved 1st ways of determining nature of Being (the ways that have guided us ever since [our destiny])

content: destruction not negative (purpose not to bury past in nullity (Nichtigkeit), stakes out positive possibilities of that tradition, must keep it w/in its limits [?] > destruction only re: stages of history of ontology that are in principle decisive [epochal thought]

content: question of Being doesn’t achieve its true concreteness until we’ve carried through process of destroying ontological tradition [telos?]
linkedContent: question of Being doesn’t achieve its true concreteness until we’ve carried through process of destroying ontological tradition [telos?]

content: in investigations where thing is deeply veiled, don’t overestimate results: constantly face possibility of disclosing an even more primordial/universal horizon from which to draw answer to question: “What is Being?” [Seinsfrage] > must reawaken question of Being before achieving positive results, arrive at a field where we can come to terms w/ it in a way that can be controlled [totally other—then teleological control?]
